Description:
QUIET COURT IN SOUGHT AFTER LOCATION…
A very quiet and prestigious court in a select part of Croydon Hills provides the perfect location for this freshly repainted family home. Everyone will love the 2 formal and casual living areas and fully equipped kitchen. More than just living, it's also definitely a home for entertaining all year round, especially with the covered deck at the side. When it's time to rest, there are 4 bedrooms with built in wardrobes and 2 bathrooms. Making it all the more livable is a wealth of extras, double garage and walking tracks - all within minutes of Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College.

Description:
Family entertainment- inside and out!
With two inspirationally designed covered alfresco entertainment areas and outdoor spa, this home is tailor-made for a growing, active family.
Add a bevy of appealing and highly functional individual rooms and shared spaces, including an impressive master bedroom with en-suite, a spacious, efficient kitchen and living areas crowned with the warm vibe of an attractively gabled timber ceiling and you have all the prerequisites for comfortable but flexible living.
Ducted heating for those decidedly 'indoor' days and secure under house storage add an extra practical dimension to comfort and style. Also featuring ducted vac, evaporative cooling and security system.
Situated in a quiet court, but close to local shopping, public transport and prestigious schools- this property is a must for active families seeking a blend of comfort, space and convenience.
Geraint Gardner : 0450 923 437

Description:
Offers Presented Tuesday 10th March at 6:30pm
Affording an esteemed position in sought-after Croydon Hills, this exceptionally well-presented home provides the ideal entry-level property, young family residence, rewarding renovation project or smart investment prospect.
Flaunting an attractive streetscape with tidy gardens, bay and multi-lit windows as well as a lengthy covered verandah, the homes bright interiors are just as inviting and appealing. Step inside and enjoy a classic galley-kitchen with plentiful bench space and cabinetry, large, naturally-illuminated formal lounge and dining domain complemented by a substantial and comfortable family zone opening via timber sliding doors to the large patio and huge rear gardens providing a secure space for kids and pets to play in a secure environment.
Accommodation needs are also well-met with three sizeable bedrooms, the second fitted with double robes and the master with a walk-in robe both enjoying ensuite-effect to the segregated family bathroom with bath and shower room, separate vanity and toilet; along with a third robed bedroom.
Further benefits include gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling ensuring optimal comfort, large laundry with external access, plentiful storage, repointed/tiled roof, off-street parking and single garage with rear roller-door access to gardens.
Situated enviably close to elite schools (Luther, Oxley and Croydon Colleges, Yarra Valley Grammar and Croydon Hills Primary), plentiful shopping options at McAdam Square, Chirnside Park and Eastland Shopping Centres as well as the vibrant hub of Croydon with cafes and rail transport plus an easy proximity to EastLink and the Yarra Valley with fine dining and scenic wineries, what more could you want? Act fast and enquire now!
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
WOW FACTOR PLUS LIVEABILITY
This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home raises family living to a whole new level. Beautifully landscaped front garden invites you to the front door. Once inside you cant miss the obvious craftsmanship. The ultra pleasant living room with its built-in bar, reverse cycle air conditioning and adjacent dining area will not fail to impress. Walk through to the kitchen/family room which also has a supplementary wall furnace and you will also appreciate the access to a covered entertaining area and BBQ. The master bedroom is very spacious with a ceiling fan and has a walk-through with four spacious robes to an up-market en-suite. Bedrooms two and three will not disappoint and both have built-in robes. The home sits on 644m (approx) with easy access to colleges and schools. The rear garden is complete with a garden shed. Be quick to inspect

Description:
HIGH APPEAL IN CROYDON HILLS
Set in a quiet court among quality homes, and handy to schools and colleges, this 3 bedroom 1 bathroom family home on 695m (approx.) has immediate street appeal. Appeal that's echoed as you step in the front door and look over the good sized living room and dining area adjacent to the kitchen. You'll be impressed with the spaciousness of the master bedroom with its 3 door timber faced wardrobes. Two more roomy bedrooms and a bright and beautifully fitted family bathroom and generous sized laundry complete the picture. Then there's the kitchen. A cooks delight with cupboards galore, lots of bench space, Bosch appliances, pantry and tiled floor. Outside there's a secure carport and two sheds, one fully shelved for that extra storage and a garden shed added to the shaded paved area, raised garden beds and the coolness of a summer shade tree. A second driveway allows parking for several cars. Simply unpack and move in! Ideal for young families with close proximity to Croydon Hills Primary School, Good Shepherd Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Minutes to McAdams Square and Eastland Shopping Centre.
Insights: 3 Tanya Court, CROYDON HILLS VIC 3136 was last sold in 2015 and 14 other 3 bedroom house in CROYDON HILLS have recently been sold.

Address: 9 Kate Charlesworth Place Croydon Hills VIC 3136
Description:
EVERYTHING THE FAMILY WANTS
If you want space, style and a premium Croydon Hills location, this is the home for your family, whether still growing or established.
The home boasts three separate formal and casual living areas plus a covered deck with inset spa - so entertaining is something you'll probably be doing a lot of all year round!
There's also a quality kitchen fitted with stainless steel appliances and an adjoining meals area just a few paces away.
Accommodation comprises four bedrooms with robes in three and an ensuite for the main.
As you'd expect in a quality home, the main bathroom is well featured with a separate bath and shower.
Adding to the appeal is a wealth of extras including stunning hardwood floors, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and an open fireplace in the lounge room.
Outside also features an open deck, huge block and double carport with remote door plus easy access to Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and the local primary school.

Description:
Dual Alfresco Entertaining Zones and Undeniable Comfort
Outstanding light infused family dimensions and designer alfresco lifestyle, you will want for nothing with this extensively appointed and beautifully styled home. Comprising 5 Bedrooms (4 with BIRs), 2 premium stone bathrooms plus a study. Master with ensuite and WIR. Creating a perfect blend of formal and casual living for busy families with sophisticated Lounge, gourmet Kitchen Family/Meals, Euro appliances (900mm oven) and waterfall Caesarstone benchtops plus handy butler's pantry. Further enhanced by a large informal Living/Rumpus (surround sound) that marries beautifully with a palatial outdoor undercover Merbau decked pavilion plus second covered relaxation area that transports you into a resort like setting with shimmering solar heated, salt chlorinated IGP. Landscaped for effortless maintenance and maximum enjoyment and set in a family focused, well regarded leafy pocket of Croydon Hills. Minutes to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Good Shepherd Primary and Croydon Hills Primary. Close to Candlebark Lake Reserve, local shops, cafes and shopping centres. Well linked to transport, freeway and Eastlink. Note all the extra inclusions: Qld Spotted Gum floors, ducted heating/cooling upstairs, 3 x split systems downstairs, blockout blinds, outdoor roof heaters, large internal storage, understairs storage, modern laundry and powder room and remote DLUG with boat storage and rear access.
Insights: 18 Lakeside Crescent, Croydon Hills VIC 3136 was last sold in 2018 and 12 other 5 bedroom house in Croydon Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT HOME
When you enter the home of a master craftsman, you can tell immediately. On 656m2 (approx) this gem is a perfect example, finally on the market and ready to delight. So much care and attention has been lovingly invested into every detail, a beacon of house-pride and classic family moments. The picture perfect topiary gardens welcome you in to a generously proportioned home, with stunning feature timber floors throughout. Classic styling includes arches zoning the sunny front lounge and formal dining, while a large and well appointed kitchen overlooks casual dining. Four bedrooms with built in robes, the master with walk in robe and ensuite. The main bathroom shines with full bath and the separate laundry is large enough for the whole family. Outdoor living includes the beautiful covered patio with the signature polished timber floor, skylights and if the weather is not ideal, cafe blinds all around. The back yard of this huge corner block is as delightful as the front, with gorgeous cubby/shed that even carries the polished timber floors, a productive home veggie garden with raised beds and netting, and more. Double garage with rear courtyard access completes the picture, positioned close to notable Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, shops and parks. A complete charmer, ready to be a star in your family history.
Insights: 55 Yarra Road, CROYDON HILLS VIC 3136 was last sold in 2015 and 24 other 4 bedroom house in CROYDON HILLS have recently been sold.

Description:
Presented to Perfection in Family Friendly Pocket
Expressions of Interest Closing Wednesday 10th December Unless Sold Prior - Flowing with undeniable ambience and awash with natural glowing light and polished Blackbutt floors, this 3 Bedroom home with gorgeous flourishing gardens is an impressive find for families, couples and downsizers alike. Located in a pretty enclave of homes and immaculately presented throughout with an elegant floorplan. Master zoned with semi ensuite and roomy WIR, adjoining private gorgeous garden nook. All bedrooms have double wardrobes with plenty of internal storage. The open plan well equipped Kitchen/Family/Meals Living domain enjoys gas cooktop, exceptional cabinetry/pantry and new rangehood. Integrating with a fabulous alfresco pergola with extended decking and seamless cafe blinds. Entertaining will be simply divine with this magnificent and secluded garden backdrop. Enjoy the effortless walk to Croydon Hills Primary and just minutes to Good Shepherd Primary, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Culinary and shopping needs are easily satisfied by McAdam's Square and nearby Eastland Shopping Centre. Good connections to parks, transport and freeway/Eastlink. Additional comfort afforded by split system heating/cooling (Living) and space heater, laundry, linen press, outdoor awnings, 2 x utilities shed and SLUG with storage.

Description:
IF I COULD - WOULD YOU?
If I could show you a family home in a great area, would you be willing to put your imagination to work?
This spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom BV home with double garage needs your personal touch to bring it back to life. Take a look at the size of the block - not only is there an excellent courtyard space off the family room but there is a large rear backyard just waiting for a swimming pool or entertaining area.
Superbly situated in the highly sought after Croydon Hills Estate with a park outside your door, you will be within walking distance of Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College/Good Shepherd Primary, and McAdam Square or just catch the local bus. Not too far away are a choice of primary schools along with the Rudolf Steiner School and an easy drive into the Yarra Valley region.
Don't take our word for it - come and see how you can increase the value of this well located home. When you get through redecorating you will have something that is uniquely, personally yours!

Description:
PRIME OPPORTUNITY IN DESIRABLE AREA
In a highly sought after pocket of Croydon Hills, this comfortable three bedroom home on a 632m2 (approx.) corner block, close to an array of quality schools, transport and lifestyle amenities, is the perfect choice for first home buyers, young families, down sizers and savvy investors alike.
Step inside to discover this inviting homes cosy feel, with soft carpet throughout the main living areas and plenty of natural light filtering through the large bay window in the lounge, adjoining the open dining and kitchen area. The generous robed bedrooms are peacefully sectioned off down the hall and the master features a walk through en suite effect leading to the separate toilet and laundry.
From the main living area step outside to find a large paved entertaining area and child and pet friendly fenced yard with a spacious lawn. Further highlights include off street parking, tool/equipment shed and low maintenance gardens. Moments from Croydon Hills Primary, Luther College, Yurrunga Recreation Reserve and McAdams Square specialty stores, cafes and transport.

Description:
Expressions of Interest by Tuesday 9 December at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Market Entry or Downsizers Delight?
Light, fresh and well maintained with 2 living areas and excellent rear garden alfresco space, this 3 bedroom home offers a market entry option for young families or a low maintenance scaledown for young at heart downsizers.
Positioned on an expansive corner block which may well prove a canny investment opportunity if future redevelopment is a consideration (STCA), the home is within walking distance of Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar.
The freshly painted and newly carpeted interior features light-filled living and family rooms and a neat, original kitchen with a skylit meals area. The 3 bedrooms (BIRs) share a family bathroom, ensuite shower room and separate WC. A paved rear terrace caters for all weather alfresco living surrounded by well-kept gardens. There is also ducted heating and evaporative cooling, a secure double carport and garden shed.
Bus access to Croydon Station and Chirnside Park SC and minutes from Eastland and Eastlink.
* 3 bedroom market entry home on 749 sq m approx. corner block
* Separate light-filled living and family rooms
* Paved and covered alfresco terrace in peaceful garden setting
* Well maintained, freshly painted and newly carpeted
* Walk to Luther, Yarra Valley and Croydon Hills Primary
* Bus to Croydon Station and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre
Terms: 10% deposit, balance by negotiation
Land: 749 sq m approx.

Description:
Expressions of Interest Closing Thursday 27 November at 5.30pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Fabulous family-sized entertainer
In a perfect child-friendly location at the end of an attractive cul-de-sac, this impressive sun-soaked 5-bedroom home ticks all the family boxes. With an outstanding covered timber deck running full-width alongside the open living zone in an indoor/outdoor entertainer's dream, enjoy a smart kitchen with quality appliances and soft-close cabinetry overlooking a wide meals and family room, and a formal lounge/dining with wood heater creating a separate living zone.
Featuring 3 downstairs robed bedrooms including a master with neat ensuite and glass door access to a side courtyard, and an upstairs teen retreat with sweeping southern views accompanied by 2 further bedrooms a plus a powder room. Includes a secluded study, bright central bathroom, large laundry, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, double auto garage plus storeroom or home office/gym.
Walk to bus, parks, kindergartens, Yarra Road Primary School and Croydon Hills Primary School, close to Yarra Valley Grammar plus Luther and Oxley Colleges, and just a short distance from Chirnside Park Shopping Centre.
* Modern 5 bedroom family home
* Open plan kitchen/meals/family zone
* Outstanding undercover entertainer's deck
* Separate formal lounge/dining with wood heater
* Close to bus, parkland, primary schools and high schools
* Within easy reach of Chirnside Park Shopping Centre
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 60 days
Land: 720 sq m approx.

Description:
Surprisingly Spacious & Stylish - 5 Bedrooms
Walk into the welcoming, freshly painted interior of this 5 bedroom 2 bathroom family residence and you'll be wowed by the space, style and flexibility. Set in an idyllic court, you'll enjoy three living zones and fashionable, light-filled spaces, dressed to impress with contemporary carpets and stunning timber floors. Four bedrooms (BIRs) and a family bathroom are zoned off the hallway. The huge master boasts ensuite and space for a sofa. The 5th bedroom and a large teen retreat, rumpus or home office (own entry) are in a separate wing. You'll love the functionality of the renovated glossy kitchen showcasing CaesarStone benchtops, quality s/s appliances, dishwasher and feature lighting. An enormous family/meals room with storage and open study, and a big formal lounge/dining will cater for any occasion. Easy outdoor living is yours with the large roofed alfresco area and gorgeous private landscaped garden with pond and vegie patch. More highlights: internal access remote double garage, ducted heating, split system and ample storage. Superbly sited, near Luther College, Croydon Hills Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar, transport, shops and EastLink.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Address: 117 Narr Maen Drive CROYDON HILLS VIC 3136
Description:
Perfectly Positioned Family Home
This well located brick home on a 727m2 (approx.), moments away from the most prestigious schools in the region, shops, reserves and bus links, offers the ideal place to settle into family life.
Featuring a comfortable design with multiple living zones, the master bedroom with a walk in robe and en suite is peacefully located at the front of the home, adjoining a formal lounge. Three robed bedrooms, one with a private study nook, share the family bathroom and separate toilet on the far end of the home.
The open living/meals area and central kitchen with 900mm gas cook top, opens out to the covered alfresco dining area. Children and adults alike will love the space to play, entertain or potter in the spacious backyard, surrounded by stunning established native flowering bushes and fruit trees, complete with a garden shed and veggie plot.
Further highlights include evaporative cooling, gas heating, laundry, gas hot water and double carport.
Eastland Shopping Centre and Eastlink are a short drive away or walk to quality schools including Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Good Sheppard Lutheran and Warranwood Primary Schools, Kurboroo Kindergarten, McAdams speciality shops and cafes, picturesque reserves/walking trails and bus links.

Description:
INVITING, COMFORTABLE, EXCITING
Spotlessly presented with a lovely welcoming feel 634m2 (approx.) of perfection in the tightly held Narr Maen estate. Living in this home is easy, everything has been taken care of; with a variety of schools, shops, parks and Eastlink all close by. The great street appeal and beautifully landscaped gardens invite you in to the comfortable, airy front lounge adjoining bright and fresh kitchen. Neutral palette and tastefully modern touches abound through the home; and three spacious bedrooms each with built in robes are complimented by even more storage and generous laundry. Sunny bathroom with bath, split system AC, gas ducted heating, ducted vac, alarm system and more. When it's time to entertain, guests will be delighted by the boutique outdoors featuring stunning timber patio and manicured gardens. This is simply a brilliant family home, in a brilliant location, just move in and enjoy.

Description:
Relaxed Living by the Park
From the private treed outlook overlooking Candlebark Walk and wetland, to the modern styling and picturesque court location, this beautifully renovated retreat presents you with idyllic living. Perfect for first homebuyers, families and investors, it's near Yarra Rd Primary, Luther College, Yarrunga, transport and McAdam Square. Newly landscaped gardens and a double carport welcome you. Walk through the entry hallway and discover natural light, pioneer pure wool carpets and beautiful leafy views. Three double bedrooms (BIRs), a separate toilet and a brand new 2-way bathroom - with granite benchtop and ensuite-effect to the master - are zoned off the hallway. Two large living areas and a gourmet kitchen showcasing s/s Blanco appliances (including 900mm oven), dishwasher and excellent storage give you space and practicality. A formal lounge/dining room, casual family/meals area and elevated deck with breathtaking views invite easy entertaining. The spacious, child-friendly landscaped garden with own gate into the reserve will also delight. Extras: ducted heating, evaporative cooling and under-house storage. Close to EastLand and EastLink.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
Family Focused With Top Schools In Easy Reach
Truly one for the family, this generous home is privately positioned in a quiet yet highly sought-after pocket of Croydon Hills between Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. The interior of the home is exceptionally bright and well thought out for family living and entertaining with a spacious formal lounge and dining room, and a family/meals area overseen by a timber kitchen. For those with a big family to accommodate, this is a home that will serve well thanks to 4 bedrooms (the main with ensuite), a family bathroom with a separate toilet and a large backyard with plenty of space to run around.
Also features:
*New bathrooms both with stone bench tops
*Painted inside & out; New carpets; Re-wired
*Gas heating & split system air conditioning
*Ample off-street parking & 2x sheds; Alarm
*Access to buses, short drive to Eastland & Eastlink
*Walk to McAdam Square & Good Shepherd Primary

Address: 14 Settlers Hill Crescent CROYDON HILLS VIC 3136
Description:
Colonial Charm & 'Croydon Hills' Prestige
A beautiful, spacious and comfortable family residence positioned superbly within a prestigious lifestyle estate is especially hard to find. This impeccably presented and prominently located home is just such a one - you will need to look no further!
Poised upon a favoured corner allotment of 703sqm (approx.) with entry via a peaceful court, this desirable family residence is impressive. At first glance, the house presents an inviting and charming streetscape, placed charmingly behind a low picket fence with lush, cultivated gardens, a full-width verandah and deep portico.
Welcoming interiors incorporate a functional layout for growing families; comprising a formal living area for the parents to enjoy, complemented by a large family zone for the younger members, and conveniently adjoining the bright meals domain open plan to the sophisticated kitchen. This streamlined space incorporates a large island bench with plentiful breakfast bar seating, premium stainless steel appliances (De Longhi 900mm gas cooktop, electric oven and canopy range hood plus Bosch dishwasher), finished with solid Caesar stone surfaces and glass splashbacks adding an elegant touch and contrasting beautifully with the richness of glossy Tasmanian Oak floors.
Accommodation needs are well met with four double bedrooms, all fitted with robes and the master complemented with a walk-in robe, adequately serviced by a full ensuite, separate toilet and family bathroom with separate shower and bathtub.
Timber sliding doors open via the dining area out to private and secure gardens offering a large paved alfresco area perfect for when entertaining and a grassed space for play.
Further notable benefits include; ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, alarm, painted feature walls, fitted laundry with external access, plentiful storage, roman blinds, external awnings and a remote double garage with convenient entry to the front verandah, ensuring dry entry on these wet spring days.
Enjoying a close proximity to Croydon Hills and Lutheran Primary Schools, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar, McAdam Square Shopping Centre, Yarrunga Reserve with tennis courts, BMX park, playground and walking trails, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Croydon rail and amenities as well as Eastland Shopping Centre and EastLink just ten minutes away. This exceptional family residence will be sought after, act fast and enquire today!
David Jennings : 0414 588 823

Description:
Space, Privacy and Easy Living
Dreaming of space, style and fabulous entertaining with a pool? This beautifully updated 4 bedroom 2 bathroom family retreat is for you. Nestled in a peaceful court, it's close to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Good Shepherd Primary, McAdam Square and transport. Pristine landscaped gardens complement light-filled spaces styled with contemporary decor. Parents have a private master featuring WIR and 2-year young luxury ensuite. A children's wing contains two double bedrooms (BIRs) and a deluxe family bathroom. The 4th double bedroom (BIRs) is also in its own wing and could be a study/guest room. You'll love to cook in the gourmet kitchen showcasing s/s appliances, dishwasher and excellent storage. Space and practicality are yours from the formal lounge/dining room and casual dining/meals area with poolside views, to the family room with timber bar. A gazebo, covered entertainer's deck and large, in-ground gas heated pool will bring hours of joy. More highlights: a pretty, child-friendly landscaped garden, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, secure double carport and shed. Near Croydon Hills Primary, reserves, Eastland and EastLink.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827
